channel.title: Vulcan
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/072FRl6.png[/img]
[url=http://up.ht/UULrPt]Download Package Files[/url]
I ran this server for a month last summer and it never really caught on, while I recently had some free time in the mornings i decided to give it another shot and once again it failed.. I found that more than half of the players who logged on where more interested in trying to abuse the server with either cheat clients or packet insertions rather than actually playing it. Since my semester is starting very soon I decided to close down shop and release the server, just in-case anyone was interested in the server itself or maybe even just a little chunk of code.
[center] [ul][li]RSA Encryption[/li] [li]Task Driven Core[/li] [li]Cleaned And Repackaged Server Files[/li] [li]Automatic Cache Downloading[/li] [li]474 Identity Kit[/li] [li]Mediocre Protection Against Packet Abuse[/li] [li]Player & Mob Clipping Support[/li] [li]Removed unnecessary concurrent locks[/li] [li]Ran five days strong without any internal problems.[/li] [li]Method For Fading Teleportation[/li] [li]Clean Game-play & Proper Grammar in dialogues[/li][/ul] [/center]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FJKC1tS.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/6gx8qh.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2qj9clt.png[/img]

done this, and i still get “reconnecting in 5s”

item.title: Vulcan
item.dc:creator: @notice notice
item.description:
@notice wrote:

hey man looks like a really good server. im looking for a 474 to do some training for oldschool runescape sounds funny i know but a few of my friends are rookies on oldschool so i said ill get a private server for us so we can train for bosses then we can go into the main game prepared haha

anyway, i use eclipes to run the client, and it doesnt want to load just reconnects -.- ive put the cache file into the right location. changed the ip. have no idea why its not working ive tried everything please help haha.

much love

Read full topic

item.title: Vulcan
item.dc:creator: @Damoiscool Damoiscool
item.description:
@Damoiscool wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:3, topic:545619”]Vulcan <3 R.I.P
I loved this server. Although at times there were some bugs, it was a great experience to play. The gambling chest was freaking amazing, I spent like 50 gambles, still didn’t get claws, but one guy gambled once and got claws >.>
Anyways, Good release![/quote]

That was me ‘Brutus’
